TopicTitle: Old images and quotes not working

Articles.Content:
I find that all the old topics images and quotes do not work. They just show as they do in the editor.

 

Other than that, I do like the new changes to the forum!

BBCode doesn't work in the editor anymore (with some exceptions, but I don't remember which), it is a WYSIWYG so just use the buttons on the editor bar.

For images and videos, just paste the link and hit the enter/return key: the image or video should appear.

Edited December 1, 2015 by Gaarst
The images and videos bit sounds easier to insert then it did before.
